entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Avoid emitting synthesized delegate types for delegates that are not referenced #55896
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Consider if "Add Using" quickfix should suggest adding "global" using as well #55895
    Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, untriaged, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective
  • Find all references for a "global" using alias finds alias references only in the file that defines it #55894
    Area-IDE, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl, IDE-Navigation, untriaged
  • When Quick Info content too long, can't scroll to read information at bottom. #55888
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Extract local function includes nameof parameter #55887
    help wanted, Area-IDE
  • Add "fix namespaces" action that applies to all files in a Solution Explorer folder #55886
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • ExpressionCompiler is unable to emit a correct code in case of captured pattern matched variable #55883
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • `Default` should be allowed on `Private Protected` properties #55880
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Closed

  • EnC: Report rude edit when compiler adds synthesized types to the compilation and runtime does not support adding types #54676
    Area-Interactive, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0
  • Large memory usage when serializing results of `GetUnusedReferenceAsync` #55869
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Enabled nullable by default in .NET 6 #52302
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, 17.0
  • Why the Visual Studio's watch window show the property , and the "@" in front of "type". #55859
    Question, Area-IDE, Resolution-Answered
  • suggestion IDE0038 + LINQ leads to error CS0103 #51340
    Bug, help wanted, Area-IDE, IDE-CodeStyle, 17.0
  • Roslyn Compiler Service is forcing unneeded GCs, wasting CPU time #55807
    Bug, Area-Compilers, Resolution-Fixed
  • Fix Hot Reload active statement remapping #52100
    Interactive-EnC, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0.P4
  • IDE0078 - Use pattern matching removes necessary side-effects in some cases #50462
    Area-IDE, Concept-Continuous Improvement, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • Add "IndentNamespace" formatting option. #24129
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Blocked, Backlog
  • Invert If refactoring is missing unit tests for Visual Basic #55677
    Area-IDE, Test, Concept-Continuous Improvement, 17.0

Updated

  • Flaky test: TupleWithElementNamedWithDefaultName #52658
    Area-Compilers, Test, Infraswat, 17.0
  • Transient failure in test AsyncIteratorWithCustomCode #34207
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Async Streams, 17.0
  • CompletingWithColonInMethodParametersWithNoInstanceToInsert is flaky #49400
    Area-Infrastructure, Test, Backlog
  • Roslyn failing to clean up listeners #48816
    Area-IDE, 4 - In Review, Test, Backlog
  • Assertion failure in CustomAttributesBag`1.get_IsEarlyDecodedWellKnownAttributeDataComputed #49026
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Flaky test 'InteractiveHostDesktopTests.StackOverflow' #46414
    Area-Interactive, Test, Flaky, Disabled Test, Backlog
  • InteractiveHostCoreTests.Stackoverflow #53392
    Bug, Area-Interactive, Test, Disabled Test
  • Attempt to load System.Runtime reference assembly for execution causes test failure #53391
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, 17.0
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking APIs #54832
    Area-IDE, Concept-API, Feature Request, New Feature - Source Generators, api-needs-work, 17.0
  • Roslyn should have an ETW/EventPipe source that we can use to report data #54770
    Bug, Concept-API, Area-Compilers, api-approved, 17.0
  • Test plan for Global Using Directive feature #51307
    Language-C#, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective, 17.0
  • Higher Level SyntaxProvider APIs for incremental generators #54725
    Concept-API, Area-Compilers, Feature Request, New Feature - Source Generators, api-approved, 17.0
  • __makeref raise csc.exe exited with code -2146232797 #51228
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Assert failure: Unexpected value 'LessDerived' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp.MemberResolutionKind' #52701
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • error MSB6006: "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 on switch with type pattern matching and async in release mode. #52639
    Bug, Area-Compilers, 17.0
  • Incorrect nullability from method type inference #27961
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types, Compiler.Next
  • Test process crash on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.EditorFeatures.UnitTests.dll #55639
    Area-IDE, Test, Flaky, untriaged, Infraswat
  • ContinuousIntegrationBuild=true produces nondeterministic source paths by default #55860
    Area-Compilers, Need More Info
  • Warn when "attribute-dependent" types are used in 'typeof' #54804
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Warning Waves, Backlog
  • Tool to help locating C# global code causing CS7022 for the real Main() #54950
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Simple Programs, untriaged
  • [Test Plan] Interpolated String Improvements #51499
    Area-Compilers, Test, New Feature - Interpolated String Improvements, Dev17 IDE Priority, 17.0
  • [Feature Request] Allow script globals object type to be passed via .rsp file #23421
    Feature Request, Area-Interactive, Backlog
  • Test plan for "record structs" #51199
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Test, 17.0
  • CodeLens reference count is not shown for const fields #32320
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Need Design Review, Backlog
  • Avoid unnecessary write in null-coalescing operator #20074
    Area-Compilers, Feature Request, Code Gen Quality, Compiler.Next
  • Safe Delete Refactoring #55588
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, untriaged
  • EnC - More attribute edit tests #54430
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC
  • Criteria for "Add Usings On Paste" to be enabled by default #49444
    Area-IDE, Story, 17.0
  • Constant, frequent crash VS 16.11 with Source Generator use #55658
    Bug, Area-IDE, Tenet-Reliability, 17.0
  • Unused type parameters in local functions could be elided #55800
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Local Functions, Code Gen Quality, untriaged

PullRequests

Created

  • Track duplicate hintNames as they are added #55905
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Explicitly switch to background thread #55903
    Area-IDE
  • Experimentation options #55902
    Area-IDE
  • Add telemetry for reasons on why `TryApplyChanges` fails in a workspace #55901
    Area-IDE
  • Remove top level attributes on MoveTypeToFile #55900
    Area-IDE
  • Adjust asserts in OverloadResolutionResult.ReportDiagnostics. #55899
    Area-Compilers
  • Include edit session runtime capabilities in telemetry data #55898
    Area-Interactive
  • Test GetSpeculativeAliasInfo for a global alias. #55897
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - GlobalUsingDirective
  • Set resources correctly on CopyRefAssembly #55893
    Area-Compilers
  • Source generators/timing #55892
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Extract async navigation portions of https://github.com/dotnet/roslyn/pull/55635 #55891
    Area-IDE
  • Use bulk unsubscribe operations in FileChangeWatcher #55890
    Area-Compilers
  • Add IEditAndContinueSolutionProvider #55889
    Area-Interactive
  • Disabled diff margin in cocoa quickfix preview. #55882
    Area-IDE
  • Add more attribute tests for more things #55881
    Area-Compilers, Interactive-EnC
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55879
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Move the bulk of the work for rename after apply to be off the UI thread #55878
    Area-IDE
  • EnC - Report rude edit when a user adds an AsyncMethodBuild attribute #55877
    Area-Interactive, Interactive-EnC

Merged

  • Bulk update project when several documents change #55813
    Area-IDE, Next
  • EnC - Report diagnostic when compiler synthesizes new types on unsupported runtime #55876
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove synchronous blocking call of go-to-def. #55885
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55839
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Reduce array allocations when constructing options #55884
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Clear dependency information from unused references after analysis #55875
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/MoveStaticMembers #55628
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Remove attribute-dependent typeof warning #55854
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • 🐇 Convert FileChangeWatcher to batch processing #55855
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Check CS0103 when try to replace type cast by 'is' pattern #55864
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Relax the induced GC strategy in ServerDispatcher #55814
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Restore intent of some top-level statement tests #55865
    Area-Compilers, Test, Next
  • Ignore stale active statements. #55850
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Fixes #50462 #55427
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #55874
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #55907
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #55906
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable VSTHRD200 (Use 'Async' suffix for async methods) #51812
    Area-IDE
  • ✨ Implement SegmentedHashSet<T> #54574
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow fully oblivious types to coexist with nullable-aware base types in partial classes #55861
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC - Tests for lambda improvements #55224
    Area-Interactive
  • Move Static Members: Refactor moved member references #55581
    Area-IDE, New Feature - Move Static Members
  • Segmented dictionary updates #54569
    Area-IDE
  • Temporarily use procdump to capture testhost dumps on helix #55657
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/snappy/nodelay to main-vs-deps #55078
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Remove langver == preview restriction for incremental generators #55866
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0.P4
  • Allow code actions to apply themselves asynchronously #55687
    Area-IDE
  • Fix foreach deconstruction nullability #52722
    Area-Compilers, Community, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Fix support for "Usings inside namespaces" in various places #55795
    Area-IDE
  • Lazily evaluate the root node for syntax trees #55716
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Don't consider syntax trees changed if the compilation is the same #55715
    Bug, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Add generator driver cache to VBCSCompiler #55023
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators
  • Use lambda expression and method group signature in type inference #55786
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements
  • Moving WinForms Editor Factory logic to WinForms #55870
    Area-IDE
  • Don't hold onto documents in 'Find' features #55635
    Area-IDE
  • Ensure synthesized attribute definitions are emitted for lambda and local function signatures #55873
    Area-Compilers
  • BoundIncrementOperator - use BoundConversion nodes to represent operand/result conversions. #54466
    Area-Compilers
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/source-build #55796
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade #55436
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Inline Hints: Option to suppress hints where the parameter name and argument name are the same #55781
    Area-IDE
  • Fix compile errors in test method code. #55613
    Area-Compilers
  • Use document with partial semantic for completion #55745
    Area-IDE
